definition: Nanhui former district of Shanghai, now in Pudong New District 浦東新區|浦东新区[Pu3 dong1 xin1 qu1], Shanghai
Nanhui former district of Shanghai, now in Pudong New District 浦東新區|浦东新区[Pu3 dong1 xin1 qu1], Shanghai

sentences.english: The dam of Luchao port, Nanhui County, is situated in the southeast of Shanghai City, facing the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 南汇县芦潮港水闸位于上海市东南角，面临东海。

sentences.english: The other stations are in Qingpu, Jiading, Nanhui and Pudong.
sentences.chinese: 其余的加油站分别在青浦，嘉定，南汇和浦东。

sentences.english: Today my husband drove his company's car to Nanhui.
sentences.chinese: 今天我老公开着公司的车去了趟南汇。
